title: Hour 2 - Deshaun Watson Developments, Frank Isola
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Deshaun Watson Developments, Frank Isola
description:
Dan covers the latest in the Deshaun Watson drama, and Frank Isola stops by to break down the Kyrie Irving situation and the rest of the NBA offseason.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
